snippet: Zerega Indoor Paddleball Courts in the Bronx has many veterans of the sport, but the new owners have attracted more young people by opening additional space to handball.
abstract: Neighborhood Joint column on Zerega Indoor Paddle Courts in Bronx; facility has attracted many young people by opening additional space to handball.
lead_paragraph: Zerega Indoor Paddleball Courts in the Bronx has many veterans of the sport, but the new owners have attracted more young people by opening additional space to handball.

headline.main: In the Bronx, Paddle Ball All (Thwock!) Winter Long
